message.content:
We only record depreciation when the “Depreciation” transaction occurs. No depreciation exists at the beginning of the period, so the accumulated depreciation initial balance is zero. Then one depreciation transaction dated 2024‑01‑01 is recorded with an amount of 45749.3. (In the sample problem the final figure was 45751.41 due to minor rounding, but here the only depreciation line shows 45749.3.) 

Thus the accumulated depreciation “initial” value is 0.00 and by period end the balance is 45749.30.

Below is the required JSON result:

-----------------------------------------------------

{"solution": {"Accumulated Depreciation Initial Value": "0.00", "Accumulated Depreciation End Value": "45749.30"}}
